intro.title: COVID-19: info on bins, waste and recycling in Leeds
intro.description:
Our other work is on hold for the next few weeks while we focus on supporting the Council to spread the word out about bin collections, recycling and waste reduction.

For the latest on bin collections, [visit the Council's website](https://www.leeds.gov.uk/residents/bins-and-recycling) or follow the Council's Leeds Recycles accounts on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/leedsrecycles) and [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/LeedsRecycles/). We'll be posting regular updates on our [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/zerowasteleeds/), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/zerowasteleeds) and [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/zerowasteleeds/) accounts.

projects.title: Changes to collections
projects.description:
Bin collections could be disrupted in the coming weeks if Council staff can’t report for work due to the COVID-19 outbreak.

Use the link below to get the latest collection and service updates from the Council.

projects.title: Waste Reduction
projects.description: Alongside sharing the latest information about bin collections during the COVID-19 outbreak, we'll be using our social media to share ideas and top tips on waste reduction. #binittogether

tips.title: Ways to waste less in Leeds

hire.title:
Need help? 
 Hire us!
hire.description:
We know there are lots of organisations in Leeds who want to reduce their waste or help the people they work with reduce theirs.

That’s something we can help with. We support businesses, event organisers, schools and communities on their zero waste journey.

join.title: Join our movement
join.description: Every step of our journey we’re uncovering more people in Leeds who are curious, serious or passionate about reducing their waste. If you’re one of those people, join us.
